description: Remove all unnecessary escape characters (no-useless-escape) in all TypeScript source files.
Fix all 'Unexpected lexical declaration in case block' errors (no-case-declarations) in all TypeScript source files.
Fix all 'NodeJS is not defined' and 'Thenable is not defined' errors by adding appropriate type imports or global type references.
Fix all 'A require() style import is forbidden' errors by replacing require() with import statements or using dynamic import as needed.
Fix all 'Empty block statement' and 'Empty class' errors by removing or filling empty blocks/classes.
Fix all 'Expected a break statement before default' and 'no-fallthrough' errors in switch statements.
Fix all 'no-unused-vars' warnings and errors by removing or using unused variables, or prefixing with _ if intentionally unused.
Fix all remaining lint errors and warnings, including module syntax, namespace, and other rule violations.
